virtual Element* ui::ListItemCheck::event_handler ( int  event,
const draw::DrawingAttr &  attr 
)
virtual

Element event handler.

This method is called on the current Element when an event (e.g., Element::ENTER, Element::UPDATE, Element::TOP_PRESS) happens.

Parameters
eventThe event to execute
Returns
For transitions, the new element is returned; otherwise this

Reimplemented from ui::ListItem.
